org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.registry
Class AeAbstractBpelRegistry

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.registry.AeAbstractBpelRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBpelRegistry
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBPWSBpelRegistry, AeWSBPELAbstractProcessBpelRegistry, AeWSBPELBpelRegistry
public abstract class AeAbstractBpelRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeBpelRegistry

An abstract base class for BPEL registries.
